messages.title: WHAT THIS ELECTION IS ABOUT
messages.content: Strong and stable leadership in the national interest with Theresa May and the Conservatives - or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn. Every vote cast for Theresa May and the Conservatives will strengthen Britain’s hand in the Brexit negotiations.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Every vote cast for Theresa May and the Conservatives will strengthen Britain’s hand in the Brexit negotiations.
We will work for a stronger economy and a better deal on Brexit.
We will build stronger defence to protect Britain.
We will support our schools to help children and young people feel their potential.
We will support our local NHS.

issues.brexitEurope: Every vote cast for Theresa May and the Conservatives will strengthen Britain’s hand in the Brexit negotiations.

issues.health: We will support our local NHS.

community.content: Supporting housing provision, improving transport, reopening police stations, supporting local shops, life chances, green spaces and properly supporting the Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea.

politicalExperience.role: Parliamentary candidate for the Kensington constituency

quotes.text: The proven strong and stable leadership needed to get the best Brexit deal for Britain.

examples: Strong and stable leadership in the national interest.
We will support our local NHS.
Supporting the Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea.
Stronger economy and a better deal on Brexit.
Build stronger defence to protect Britain.
Support our schools to help children and young people.
Proven strong and stable leadership needed for Brexit deal.
Theresa May: The proven strong and stable leadership needed to get the best Brexit deal for Britain.
Weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.
Weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Victoria Borwick is the local candidate for Kensington.
